about_the_game:
Bring the golden era sound of JRPGs to your game with twenty tracks of high fantasy from composer Joel Steudler! Memorable melodies recall the classic soundtracks of the 16-bit and 32-bit console era and fill your game with nostalgic charm. Adventure, action and emotion fill this pack. Also includes twenty Music Events!

Features:

- 20 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, field, themes, and towns!
- 20 Music Events for memorable moments!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your game projects.

Tracklist:

Battle - Chivalrous Charge
Battle - Hold The Line
Battle - Jesters Army
Battle - Knights Advance
Battle - Steel Soldiers
Dungeon - Darkest Delving
Dungeon - Oasis Cave
Dungeon - Overlord Keep
Dungeon - The Barons Basement
Dungeon - Wizards Wardrobe
Field - Majestic Country
Field - Mystic Forest
Field - Wide World
Theme - Headquarters
Theme - Hearts Cry
Town - Castle Gates
Town - Enchanted Village
Town - Grand Cathedral
Town - Happy At Home
Town - Heading To Market

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Retro Fantasy Music Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Retro Fantasy Music Pack - $14.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Retro Fantasy Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Blast the past with twenty classic JRPG-style tunes of high flying fantasy from composer Joel Steudler! Outfit your bravest heroes with bold melodies. Also includes twenty Music Events!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
